column4: I have no sound after an upgrade from 9.05 to Koala.  I'm getting this output from my dmesg ... can someone help out? http://paste.ubuntu.com/385888/
It's an IntelHDA (forget the number) in an HP Pavilion dv7.  I had to tweak a few config files in 9.04 to get rid of the stuttering issue lots of folks had.
Potato: 00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801I (ICH9 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 03)
also, check the sliders in alsa-mixer-gui
I added the modprobe config and rebooted.  the drivers aren't being loaded.  like the sound card isn't being picked up at all.  http://paste.ubuntu.com/385898/
if that all fails, install the backports module in synaptic for alsa, I'll find the package name if you can't
if it's blacklisted, remove it from the blacklist file.
